name: Muse Dash - Just as planned
detailed_description:
The “Just as planned” pack:
 
To the players that bought the “Just as planned” pack, here is an important message!
 
You can sycronize your account level, illustrations, characters, pets, album collections, scores from your mobile device by login the same account in “option” -> “account”. But due to not being able to transfer your purchase, we are very sorry that we could not transfer the data of the music packs.
 
Muse Dash currently have 40 base songs and 13 DLC music packs. Each of the packs includes 6 additional songs and that won’t be it! We will update the game one music pack each month! Watch out for new contents!

Q&A https://steamcommunity.com/app/774171/discussions/0/1645418261862037680/

short_description: The movement of our world has been adapted.Can you hear my whispering? Now Game Start!!
supported_languages:
Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, English, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
